entry.title: LevelDB benchmarking
entry.summary: In a bitcoin-dev discussion, it was pointed out that Satoshis code uses ordered access/iteration in at least one place where it looks up the "owner transactions" of a tx. It is unclear what that code is used for, but it exists. However, in a recent conversation on #bitcoin-dev, it was suggested that CTxDB::ReadOwnerTxes might not have been used anywhere in the code, even in 0.1.5.
